page.title: 08Leisure, Mawdesley
page.content: People enjoy themselves in many different ways in our village. For the children there are Cubs,Scouts,Brownies and Guides,morris dancing and a youth club. For the adults there is football, cricket,bowling,tennis and badminton. Each year,the Mawdesley Dramatic Society puts on a pantomime and a play. The new village hall has provided many new activities.Indoors people can play table-tennis and badminton. Outdoors there are four floodlit tennis courts.These are all- weather courts,so football can also be played on them. We have a good-sized cricket ground with a pavilion.In summer, matches are played against other villages.There is also a good bowling green,which is popular in good weather.
